item.title: Introduction to technical wrting mentorship program
item.description: Technical writing bridges the gap between complex concepts and their practical application. Whether documenting software features, creating user manuals, or explaining intricate processes, technical writers are crucial in making information accessible to a wide audience.

item.title: Authors
item.description: These fantastic folks volunteered their time and skills to create this Open Source Technical Writing Course for Beginners. It’s packed with useful stuff and totally FREE for everyone!

item.title: Intro to technical writing
item.description: This detailed guide covers the fundamentals of technical articles, effective technical writing strategies, various types of technical documentation, identifying your target audience, and the essential steps in the technical writing process.

item.title: Information Architecture
item.description: Technical writers are the architect of knowledge, but curating effective documentation requires more than just a clear prose. A well-crafted information architecture forms the foundation, ensuring users can navigate complex information with ease and find the answers they need quickly.

item.title: About Us
item.description: Our program is designed for individuals looking to improve their technical writing skills and advance their careers in software development, community management, and developer advocacy.

item.title: API Documentation Assignment
item.description: Assignment Title: The Movie Database (TMDb) API Documentation Objective In this assignment, you will create API documentation for The Movie Database (TMDb) API using Postman or any API platform you can use (Eg, Readme,Postman), a popular movie and TV show database API.

item.title: Glasp User Guide Assignment
item.description: Assignment Title: Glasp user guide Do the following: Generate the table of content. Choose a suitable title. Write in Markdown. Create a repo on GitHub.

item.title: Technical Writing Talent
